headline: SSUI v5.10.0 Released - Auto-Updater & UI Improvements
shortDescription: SSUI is now able to poll for updates while running and will show update notifications on the Dashboard. Also includes a slight config UI & texts overhaul, an improved dynamic announcements system, and various bug fixes.
bodyHtml:
Key Updates:
• Auto-updater now checks every 6 hours and notifies you of updates
• Config page redesigned with sliding tabs
• Fixed world saved notifications and SteamCMD exit status 8 errors
• Multiple announcements can now display simultaneously

View full release notes
author: Jackson
